about_the_game:
Step into the tranquil beauty of nature with Nature Escapes, a delightful hidden object game that invites you to explore serene, handcrafted scenes from around the world. Each chapter offers a peaceful escape into the wonders of nature, where you can unwind and discover hidden treasures in stunning, picturesque landscapes.

As you journey through 24 calming chapters filled with over 70 hidden object scenes and minigames, you'll have the chance to create your own dream garden. Decorate it with a variety of unique plants and flowers, transforming your space into a personal haven of natural beauty.

Enjoy fascinating tidbits about the plants you discover and let Nature Escapes guide you through a soothing adventure that brings the outdoors inside. Perfect for nature lovers and those looking for a relaxing gaming experience, this game offers the perfect blend of exploration and creativity.

Unwind and enjoy the simple pleasures of nature with Nature Escapes. Your journey to a beautiful garden and peaceful landscapes awaits!
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Explore 24 chapters of cozy, nature-themed fun.

  • Discover over 70 hidden object scenes and minigames.

  • Enjoy gentle, calming music as you play.

  • Learn interesting facts about a wide variety of plants.

  • Design and decorate your very own garden oasis.


About the Game

Step into the tranquil beauty of nature with Nature Escapes, a delightful hidden object game that invites you to explore serene, handcrafted scenes from around the world. Each chapter offers a peaceful escape into the wonders of nature, where you can unwind and discover hidden treasures in stunning, picturesque landscapes.

As you journey through 24 calming chapters filled with over 70 hidden object scenes and minigames, you'll have the chance to create your own dream garden. Decorate it with a variety of unique plants and flowers, transforming your space into a personal haven of natural beauty.

Enjoy fascinating tidbits about the plants you discover and let Nature Escapes guide you through a soothing adventure that brings the outdoors inside. Perfect for nature lovers and those looking for a relaxing gaming experience, this game offers the perfect blend of exploration and creativity.

Unwind and enjoy the simple pleasures of nature with Nature Escapes. Your journey to a beautiful garden and peaceful landscapes awaits!

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2014 or newer Intel Core i5 / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 2GB+ Memory
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Get ready to get lost in the wild beauty of Nature with this hidden object game! Let Nature Escapes take you on a trip to handcrafted snapshots of untamed wonder, and decorate your very own garden until it becomes a bouquet of beautiful plants and flowers!
